# PR Summary

This adds an “After Install” script on macOS that will add the newly installed pwsh (or pwsh-preview) executable to `/etc/shells`.

Since the Homebrew cask relies on the pkg, that will get this feature for free, in theory.

## PR Context

PowerShell must be listed in `/etc/shells` for it to be set as the default shell on macOS and since @rjmholt is enabling PowerShell to be a login shell, we’ll need our installer to do this automatically so that the experience is seamless.
